channel.title: It's amazing what you can make immature mongoloids do
channel.description:
*help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: wait does he host it on his computer O M F G says: ya O M F G says: dumbass *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: wow *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: then he's such a failure *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: you do realize that it costs waaay more on his electric bill than for simple paid hosting *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: and if he gets a virus, etc. *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: there goes your whole forum *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: and seeing as its a forum where people can uplaod O M F G says: I wudnt be talkin if I cudnt walk down a flight of stairs without no bein able to hold myself up and not rol down *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: he can EASILY (and i cannot stress that enough) get a Trojan/Worm/Etc. *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: wtf? *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: Are you really that big a failure as to resort to childish insults which make literally no sense? *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: And I can, as a matter of fact, walk up and down flights of stairs without falling/rolling down *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: And take an english class O M F G says: I'm amazed u dont collapse under all that fat *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: Your spelling and grammar is absolutely atrocius *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: I'm amazed you're not in Special Education. *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: Let's see what happens now? O M F G says: I'm tierd of listenin to a "porn star" that eighs several tons O M F G says: blocked *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: LOLOLOL *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: You fail *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: If a human being weighed several tons *help io9 - http://www.io9labs.com/forums/ <--Join the forums! says: He/she wouldn't be alive
He blocked me after that. Amazing what happens when you outsmart psychological equivalents of 5 year-olds. Lets all laugh at him, and learn how to not act in real life. P.S. The "porn star" part is from my personal text on MSN which uses that i'm emoticon and ends up saying "i'm a porn star"

lul, I already advertised io9Labs on these forums, plus it was already approved, like, ages ago…

item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“MybJames, post:42, topic:96046”]Why are you even crediting this immature fat mongoloid with the phrase “l2” It’s been around for ages. Frank actually brought it here, not io9.[/quote]nah, just like ‘imo’ and ‘tbh’ i waited a suitable amount of time until it would be cooler

Read full topic

item.title: It's amazing what you can make immature mongoloids do
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:41, topic:96046”][quote author=io9 link=topic=138649.msg1338453#msg1338453 date=1179559775]

Io9 just heard the world Mongoloid at school.
Io9 are you intellectually mortified?

Who is Io9, I’m io9.
And no, not at school. Actually, every week I pick a word out of the dictionary and try to use it for a week straight. It’s fun to do when you’re bored. Like REAAAAAAAAAAAAALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLY bored.
[/quote]is that because you dont go to school?[/quote]
I do go to school.

[quote=“nix, post:48, topic:96046”]lol i love how he cant spell fail …

Edit: And just incase he attempts to rectify his horrid spelling before we all laugh:

l2notfaleatinultingusingmyjokeskai?[/quote]

That’s cause I wasn’t bothering to use proper proper spelling/grammar in that post.

Read full topic
item.source: It's amazing what you can make immature mongoloids do

Read full topic

ex. l2 read

ex. l2read
